Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) technology has attracted vast attention for combined heat and power (CHP) application on low or zero carbon emissions because of its high efficiency and multi-fuel selectivity.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: Due to the high operation temperature, a commercial SOFC system requires a complex system thermal balance and stack self-heating ability which are dramatically influenced by the inlet temperature, reaction heat and thermal radiation of the stack.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: Multi-fuel selectivity is a further distinct advantage when considering the future variety of renewable fuel sources, such as ammonia (from animal farming), bio-methane (from agriculture), and the other hydrocarbons using carbon capture as an effective H2 carrier.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: However, the alternating between different fuel types may result in reduced power and the internal heat balance to change, which may further lead to the stack cooling down or over heated.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: An appropriate model with fast calculation processing capability is necessary to assess the internal changes before switching the fuel source and to inform further decision making to enable the control system to adapt to the change.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: In this paper, a cross-channel, flat SOFC semi-empirical model is proposed and validated by a commercial 700 W stack using real testing data to assess the accuracy of the simulation results.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: The SOFC model has multi-fuel ability which presents different properties and internal understanding for H2, NH3, and reformed CH4 through relevant charts (for feed, velocity, temperature, reaction rate, current, power, heat, efficiency).
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: The power outputs for the different fuel sources, H2, NH3, and reformed CH4, are 721.0 W, 628.9 W and 679.7 W respectively when calculated at an air inlet temperature of 893 K.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: The modeling work was completed using Aspen Plus for SOFC system thermal balance simulations which determined the power output property for 813.3 W (H2), 744.5 W (direct NH3) and 740.7 W (reformed CH4) at the 2.0 times stoichiometric ratio of air feed, and CHP rate of 0.903 (H2), 0.787 (direct NH3) and 0.311 (reformed CH4).
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack

Sentencas: This work has the potential to contribute to the United Nation Sustainable Development Goal for Affordable and Clean Energy, Goal 7.
Titulo: Crossflow flat solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) semi-empirical modeling and the multi-fuel property based on a commercial 700 W stack
